name: Tanki (Pavel Kulyov)
description:
This game was made for Autumn Lisp Game Jam 2021 using hy and raylib.

Controls:

SHIFT - jump engines

P - toggle pause, M - toggle music, R - restart level, D - debug mode

If pre-build version for some reason failed to run, you can try to run game from sources using this instruction.

Github page: https://github.com/pkulev/tanki
